alert.note: Alert for Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 17 at 3:04PM CDT until July 18 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A FIRE WEATHER WATCH FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST WYOMING AND THE NEBRASKA PANHANDLE FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 417, 418, 419, 430, 431, 432, 433, 434, 435, 436, AND 437... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from 11 AM - 9 PM MDT Monday. * WIND...West to west-southwest winds 15 to 25 mph sustained with possible gusts to 35-45 mph by late afternoon and early evening. * HUMIDITY...Afternoon humidity 9 to 15 percent. * HAINES...5 to 6 or Moderate to High potential for rapid fire growth. * THUNDERSTORMS...Isolated dry thunderstorms are possible on Monday afternoon and early evening. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions may develop. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest
